Uses of Package
com.syndloanhub.loansum.product.facility

  • Packages that use com.syndloanhub.loansum.product.facility 
    Package Description
    com.syndloanhub.loansum.pricer.facility.prorated
    Cash flow and pricing functions applied to prorated loan trades.
    com.syndloanhub.loansum.product.facility
    Global (non-prorated) representations of loan facility types.
    com.syndloanhub.loansum.product.facility.prorated
    Traded share (prorated) representations of loan facility types.
  • Classes in com.syndloanhub.loansum.product.facility used by com.syndloanhub.loansum.pricer.facility.prorated 
    Class and Description
    AnnotatedCashFlow
    A basic cash flow annotated with additional information needed for reporting.
    AnnotatedCashFlows
    A collection of annotated cash flows.
    CashFlowType
    Enumeration of loan cash flow types.

    A list describing the type of documentation used to settle a secondary market syndicated loan trade.

    LoanTradingType
    A list that specifies whether a trade was executed during the syndication period or in the post-syndication market.
    Proratable
    A loan facility artifact containing global numerical values which can be adjusted down to a specific share based on a specific trade.
    Repayment
    Repayment represents a contract-level event repaying funded principal.
